home.title: YouTube Video Summaries in Seconds
home.subtitle: Save time and learn faster with intelligent video summaries
home.metaDescription: Save time and learn faster with intelligent video summaries
home.keywords: YouTube, summaries, video, summarization, learning, education, time-saving

features.title: Features
features.quickSummariesDesc: Get the key points of any video in seconds.
features.timeSavingDesc: Save up to 90% of your time with instant video summaries.
features.acceleratedLearningDesc: Learn faster and more efficiently with our AI-powered summaries.
features.forEveryoneDesc: Perfect for students, professionals, and lifelong learners.
features.diverseContentDesc: Support for multiple languages and video formats.
features.valuableInsightsDesc: Extract key insights and main takeaways instantly.
features.customizationDesc: Choose between different summary formats to suit your needs.
features.accessibilityDesc: Make video content more accessible with text summaries.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Simply copy and paste the URL of the YouTube video you want to summarize.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Select between key points, paragraph, or full page.
howItWorks.step3Desc: In seconds, receive a concise and accurate summary of the video content.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.quote1: Resumyt has saved me hours of time watching long videos. Now I can get the key information in minutes.
testimonials.quote2: As a researcher, this tool is invaluable. It helps me quickly scan through hours of lecture content.
testimonials.quote3: The AI summaries are surprisingly accurate and help me stay productive.
testimonials.quote4: I use Resumyt daily for my online courses. It's a game-changer!
testimonials.quote5: Perfect for reviewing technical tutorials. Saves me so much time!
testimonials.quote6: The multiple summary formats are great. I use bullet points for quick reviews and full pages for detailed study.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied users and start summarizing your videos today.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Resumyt is a platform that provides concise and accurate summaries of YouTube videos in seconds.
faq.a2: Resumyt uses advanced AI technology to analyze and summarize YouTube videos. It extracts key points, paragraphs, or full summaries based on your preferences.
faq.a3: Yes, Resumyt offers a free tier with limited usage. For unlimited access and additional features, you can upgrade to a premium plan.
faq.q4: Can I use Resumyt for educational purposes?
faq.a4: Absolutely! Resumyt is an excellent tool for students, researchers, and educators to save time and learn faster from YouTube videos.
